for those with problems installing (invalid serial) follow the firewall blocking process then the install process, allow sys restart and then when setup gets stuck at serial input go to start / run  then type regedit and open it.  go to HKEY_CURRENT_USER   /  software   /   Ahead .  now in these sub folders there are three registry entries related to nero update which should be deleted (they all have 'update' in the title and you may have to search a few folders for them) then insert provided serial and continue
